article.title: GET /
article.description: Gets information about a server (a Sync Gateway instance)

introduction.paragraph: This call returns a JSON object that contains information about the Sync Gateway instance.

body.paragraph: This request does not have any required headers.
This request does not use query parameters.
This request does not use a message body.

topic.title: Response
topic.body:
Status codes
200 OK – Request completed successfully ß
Response headers
This response uses only standard HTTP headers.
Message body
The message body is a JSON document that contains the following objects:
Name Type Description
couchdb string Contains the string “Welcome” (this is required for compatibility with CouchDB)
vendor/name string The server type (value: "Couchbase Sync Gateway")
vendor/version string The server version
version string Sync Gateway version number

body.paragraph: The following example retrieves information for a session in database named cookbook.
